meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he started horking in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: She felt sick and ended up horking all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The dog was horking up his dinner, much to the family's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river horked debris onto the banks.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride left her horking over the side.

meanings.definition: A loud, unpleasant noise made while vomiting.
meanings.sent1: The sound of horking echoed through the quiet room.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't sleep due to the horking coming from the next room.
meanings.sent3: The horking from the party next door kept him awake all night.
meanings.sent4: The horking in the horror movie made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent5: The horking in the dark alley startled the passersby.
